name: Data and APIs
description: Province provided Data and API Services

sourceProperties.title: BC Government API Registry
sourceProperties.description: The Province of British Columbia API Registry

sourceProperties.title: BC Data Catalogue
sourceProperties.description: The BC Data catalogue helps users to find, understand and explore data. The catalogue also provides contact information so that data users can contact Data Custodians for additional information if required.

sourceProperties.author: webgismd
sourceProperties.title: BC Web Mapping and Spatial Services
sourceProperties.description: There are many options for web mapping technology. The purpose of this site is to help people become more familiar with what is available in the area of spatail web services and web mapping hosted solutions.
